message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $10000 for it. This is a special offer tailored to meet your needs and expectations.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $10000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with right now. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to negotiate further. In light of this, I propose a price of $9500 for the product. This is a fair compromise considering both the value of the product and your budget.
